name: Under the Dark Tree
description:
Step into the eerie world of 'Under the Dark Tree' where you will challenge your vocabulary skills while trying to guess words written in black metal font, hidden amongst the twisted roots of a mysterious tree. With every incorrect guess, the tree's branches fall down, adding to the tension. Can you solve all the cryptic word puzzles before it's too late?
